ARABIC: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do they have Divine partners? Then let them produce their partners if they are telling the truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or have they any partners? Let them bring their partners then, if what they say is true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or has something been guaranteed by any of those whom they associate with Allah in His Divinity?” If so, let them bring forth their associates, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: they will receive the same thing that the Muslims will? Do they have any witness to such an agreement? Let them bring out such witness, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or is it that they have partners in worship? So they should bring their appointed partners, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have they "partners" Then let them bring their "partners" if they are truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they associates if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates, if they speak truly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have they other gods? Then let them bring their other gods if they are truthful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or have they other partners [besides God]? Let them bring forth their other partners, if what they say be true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have they associate gods? Then let them produce their associate gods if they say sooth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they have any ‘partners’ [that they claim for Allah]? Then let them produce their partners, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or have they some "Partners" (in Allahhead)? Then let them produce their "partners", if they are truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have they "partners"? Then let them bring their "partners" if they are truthful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates, if what they say is true!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they have partners? Then let them produce their partners, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:41] Or do they have partners?, who agree with them in this claim of theirs and able to guarantee it for them; if that is the case: Then let them produce their partners, those who will guarantee this for them, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have they other gods? Then let them bring their other gods if they are truthful) that they will have that which they claim.
